ProductInfo.Features:
Intel® CoreTM i7 Processor 3635QM (2.40 GHz, 6 MB L3 Cache) - Intel® HM76 Chipset - Windows 8
17.3" SuperBright 300 nit FHD LED Display (1920 x 1080) - NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 650M Graphics, OptimusTM technology, 2 GB GDDR5
8 GB DDR3 System Memory at 1600 MHz - 1 TB S-ATAII Hard Drive (5400RPM) with ExpressCache 16 GB - Super Multi Dual Layer (9.5 mm, Slot loading type)
10 / 100 / 1000 Gigabit Ethernet LAN - Intel® Centrino® Advanced-N 6235, 2 x 2 802.11abg/n (up to 300 Mbps), Widi Support - Bluetooth V4.0 - HD Audio
SoundAliveTM - JBL 3 Speakers (With sub-Woofer) - 1.3 megapixel HD Webcam
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung NP700Z7C-S03CA Series 7 Notebook (17.3-inch, i7-3635QM, 8GB-DDR3, 1TB HDD, GT 650M-2G, Windows 8, Silver)
